unnormalised: Okay, folks, traffic’s a mess, and the authorities are finally doing something about it! New regulations are hitting the streets, especially around Chennai and Bangalore, just in time for Onam.
normalised: Okay, folks, traffic's a mess, and the authorities are finally doing something about it! New regulations are hitting the streets, especially around Chennai and Bangalore, just in time for Onam.

unnormalised: Basically, stricter fines for everything. Think double the Rs. 500 for signal jumping – yikes! And those fancy two-wheelers weaving through traffic? Expect cameras and even stricter enforcement. They're cracking down on modified silencers too, probably thanks to complaints from Auntie next door!
normalised: Basically, stricter fines for everything. Think double the rupee five hundred for signal jumping – yikes! And those fancy two-wheelers weaving through traffic? Expect cameras and even stricter enforcement. They're cracking down on modified silencers too, probably thanks to complaints from Auntie next door!

unnormalised: Reports suggest the Bangalore Traffic Police are even considering a point system, like they do in some foreign countries, where too many violations mean you lose your license. Ouch.
normalised: Reports suggest the Bangalore Traffic Police are even considering a point system, like they do in some foreign countries, where too many violations mean you lose your license. Ouch.

unnormalised: The goal, apparently, is to reduce accidents by 20% within the next year. Good luck with that, especially with all the Onam rush!
normalised: The goal, apparently, is to reduce accidents by twenty percent within the next year. Good luck with that, especially with all the Onam rush!

unnormalised: Also, parking’s getting insane. Expect to shell out a fortune (Rs. 200+) if you're caught parking more than 1 km from designated zones in crowded areas.
normalised: Also, parking's getting insane. Expect to shell out a fortune (rupee two hundred plus) if you're caught parking more than one kilometer from designated zones in crowded areas.

unnormalised: Better brush up on those traffic rules – a biryani feast could end up costing you way more than you bargained for this festival season! Drive safe, y'all!
normalised: Better brush up on those traffic rules – a biryani feast could end up costing you way more than you bargained for this festival season! Drive safe, y'all!
